title: 'Valente' script
content:
Hi folks...in need of some assistance again. I can tell the serif is Trajan, but the script has me stumped:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119060659im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/logo_5059.jpg)

Assistance is much appreciated!

 [‹ Illustrated Circus/Broadside/Woodcut Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119060659/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42496 "Go to previous forum topic") [Something similar to Lubalin Graph, diffrent serifs ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119060659/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42310 "Go to next forum topic")
author: iskippy227

comments.content: That’s why I love this place...three minutes and someone has the answer. Very much appreciated!
